name: ...Walk It Dry
effect:
Can only be played if the card titled Stomp a Mudhole... is in your Ring area.
Discard 1 card, shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and your opponent overturns # cards, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.
Raw logo
Unique

name: 3 Minutes and We're Out
effect:
Your opponent reveals his Backlash deck and randomly discards 3 Pre-match cards.
When your opponent cannot play any Title Belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, reveal your Backlash deck and randomly discard 3 Pre-match cards. Put any discarded cards with the Raw logo into your Backlash deck.
Raw logo
Unique

name: According to Linda and the Board of Executives
effect:
Cannot be played by Right to Censor.
The maximum number of Pre-match and Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area are both increased by 2.
Ignore the "Can only be played..." text on your cards titled Not According to the Fine Print!
Your opponent searches your Arsenal and Backlash deck. If he finds a Face or Heel card, you lose the game via Pinfall Victory. Shuffle your Arsenal.
Active
Permanent

name: Add Insult to Injury
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Your opponent may overturn 5 cards. If he does not, he discards 2 cards.
"There's no reason for that, folks, no reason at all!" - Jim Ross

name: All I Care About Are My Freaks and My Peaks
effect:
As an action, put up to 2 Maneuver cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.
As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
"He don't care about nothin', King, 'cept his Freaks and Peaks." - Jim Ross

name: Always
effect:
Cannot be reversed when the card titled Backstage Politics is in your Ring area.
Draw 1 card.
When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your opponent's Ring area to reverse any card or effect your opponent controls that removes any number of your cards from your Ring area and end your opponent's turn.
Active
Permanent

name: Backstage Donnybrook
effect:
After your and your opponent's Pre-match phases, before the first turn of the game, all players set their hands aside, draw cards equal to the number of cards set aside, and then shuffle the cards set aside into their Arsenals.
Rikishi, Brothers of Destruction, and Ric Flair draw 2 fewer cards.
Active

name: Backstage Politics
effect:
Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your opponent's turn, he may put 1 non-unique card from his Ring area into his Ringside pile and put this card into his Ring area.
When this card is in any Ring area, cards that go to Right to Censor's Ringside pile are removed from the game and their cards and effects cannot modify the Fortitude of their opponent's Reversal cards.
Active
Permanent

name: Beat You Raw
effect:
If your opponent does not have a card in his Ring area with the Smackdown logo, this card is -6F and you may remove it from the game and draw 1 card.
If your opponent has a card in his Ring area with the Smackdown logo, your cards cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck for the rest of the turn.
Raw logo

name: Big Evil - Red Devil
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile to search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Reversal card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Big Freak'n Powerslam
effect:
When successfully played, your opponent discards 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"That's one big freak'n powerslam, King!" - Jim Ross

name: Big Poppa Pump
effect:
Superstar Ability:
During your turn, you may discard any number of cards and your next Maneuver card played this turn is -4F for each card discarded. You cannot play more than 2 maneuvers per turn.

name: Blind Tag
effect:
Can only be played if you are an inactive member of your team.
Cannot be reversed if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.
As an action, you are now the active player and may begin your turn.
As a reversal, reverse any Set-up card and end your opponent's turn.
(Tag Team Only Symbol)

name: Body Vise
effect:
If reversed from your opponent's hand or Backlash deck, he may remove 1 card in your Ringside pile from the game.
When successfully played, you may remove 1 card in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game.
"And let me tell you ... I know a thing or three about vises!" - Jerry Lawler

name: Capture Suplex
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the card titled From the Top Rope and end your opponent's turn.
"He's caught - now what's he going to do with him?" - Jonathon Coachman

name: Chase Off Manager
effect:
Cannot be reversed when played by a Male Superstar.
You may put 1 Pre-match Manager from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.
When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play the card titled Manager Interferes.

name: Chavo's Inverted Powerbomb
effect:
You may search for this card as if it were a High Risk maneuver.
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or the cards titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope.
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope and end your opponent's turn. If the first card you play on your next turn is a High Risk maneuver, you can ignore the "Can only be played after..." text.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Cheat 2 Win
effect:
Search your Ringside pile and Arsenal for 2 Face or 2 Heel cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

Unique

name: Chief Morley Says...
effect:
Can only be played if you have fewer Reversal cards in your Ring area than your opponent.
When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a card from his hand or Backlash deck, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and put the reversed card into your hand.
When this card is in your Ringside pile, before your Draw Segment, you may discard 1 card and put this card into your Backlash deck.
Raw logo
Active

name: Collegiate Champions
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, remove 1 card in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game.
When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 3 cards, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent discards the chosen card.
When this card is put into your Ringside pile from your Ring area, you may look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent discards the chosen card.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Cripple Opponent
effect:
Look at your opponent's hand, you may choose 1 Maneuver card and 1 Action card, and your opponent discards the chosen cards.

Unique

This card is +#F, where # is equal to the number of cards with the word "shoot" in the title in all Ring areas.

effect: When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, if your opponent has 8 or more cards in his hand, he discards 2 cards.

effect:

Unique

name: Ring Psychology: Arm
effect:
If you have 4 or more Grapple or Submission maneuvers in your Ring area with the words "arm," "shoulder," or "wrist" in the title, your Grapple and Submission maneuvers are +4D and your opponent's non-High-Risk maneuvers do a maximum of 4D.
Active
Permanent

name: Ring Psychology: Leg
effect:
If you have 3 or more Grapple or Submission maneuvers in your Ring area with the words "knee," "leg," or "toe" in the title, your opponent cannot reverse any maneuver with the words "knee," "leg," or "toe" in the title from his hand or Backlash deck.
If you have 6 or more Grapple or Submission maneuvers in your Ring area with the words "knee," "leg," or "toe" in the title, your opponent also cannot reverse any maneuver with the words "knee," "leg," or "toe" in the title from his Arsenal.
Active
Permanent

name: Rolling Suplex
effect:
When successfully played, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "suplex" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
"After the Rat Trap, this is my second favorite move to see performed!" - Lita

name: Screw the Rules!
effect:
Choose 1 Stipulation card in your or your opponent's Ring area.
When this card is in your Ring area, the text on that card is blank.
Raw logo
Unique
"Because it's time to play The Game!" - The Game

name: Series of Punches
effect:
Can only be played after the cards titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope.
Can only be reversed by Unique cards or by cards that specifically reverse a maneuver played after the cards titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope.
Stun Value: 2

name: Series of Stipulations
effect:
You cannot play non-Stipulation Pre-match cards.
The maximum number of Stipulation cards you may play is increased by 1.
Smackdown logo

name: Shake
effect:
Can only be reversed by the card titled Escape Move.
"He's got him, King - complete lack of respect!" - Jim Ross

name: Shawn Michaels
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Your Backlash deck may contain an additional 2 Pre-match cards and an additional 2 Mid-match cards. Your Arsenal may contain an additional 15 cards.

name: Shining Wizard Kick
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Cannot be reversed.
When successfully played, you may put 1 Backlash deck card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Show Me Something!
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, if your opponent has 3 or fewer cards in his hand, he overturns 1 card.

name: Smackdown #1 Announcer Funaki
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, draw 3 cards and then put 3 cards in your hand on top of your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Active

name: Snap Slam
effect:
When successfully played, your opponent may remove 1 card in your Ringside pile from the game.
Stun Value: 1
"He hoisted him up quick and snapped him down - wasn't that great, J.R.?" - Jerry Lawler

name: Split Finger Lock
effect:
As a maneuver, discard up to 5 cards and your opponent overturns the same number of cards.
As an action, discard this card. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it is +3D.

name: Stacy Keibler, Marketing Manager
effect:
You may put up to 2 cards titled Managed by Stacy Keibler from your Ringside pile into your Ring area and remove up to 2 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game.
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Keibler's Cookies cannot be reversed, they are Permanent, and they are not Active.
Raw logo
Permanent
Unique
"I'm going to show the world how much I love your Testicles..." - Stacy Keibler

name: Stephanie McMahon Decrees...
effect:
Cannot be reversed if the card titled Managed by Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley is in your Ring area.
When this card is in your Ring area, ignore the words "if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating" on your card titled Managed by Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley. Your Mid-match cards with the Smackdown logo have the added text of "The maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1."
Smackdown logo

name: Stomp a Mudhole...
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Cannot be reversed.
When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal and Ringside pile for the card titled ...Walk It Dry, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1

name: Stun the Crowd
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, your cards with Stun Value are +1D and +1 Stun Value.

name: Submit!
effect:
Put 1 Submission Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand and search your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"He's pulling down the straps, Cole, it's almost over!" - Tazz

name: Surprise Drop Kick
effect:
As a maneuver, you may put up to 2 non-Mid-match cards in your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.
As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: Sweet Chin Music
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver.
As an action, this card is -30F, discard this card and put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent.
As a reversal, when played from your hand, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Take Care of Number One
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, when you successfully play a card to your Ring area that shuffles any number of cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, shuffle in 1 additional card.
If your Superstar is Team Angle, when you successfully play a Grapple or Submission maneuver, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

name: Team Angle
effect:
Superstar Ability:
When you successfully play a Grapple or Submission maneuver, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. When your opponent reverses a Grapple or Submission maneuver, he discards 1 card. You may play the cards titled Intelligence, Integrity, Intensity, and Do YOU Live By the Three I's? You cannot play any Title Belts except the Tag Team Title Belts.

name: Test
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Your Backlash deck may contain an additional 6 Mid-match cards. You cannot play any Pre-match cards except the card titled Managed by Stacy Keibler, it is not a Heel card, and before the Pre-match you may put up to 2 into play. You may not play more than 2 of any non-unique card. You may play up to 2 of all unique cards. Before your Draw Segment, your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards your opponent has in his hand greater than the number of cards in your hand+2.

name: Test Drive
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 2D or greater maneuver. Draw up to 2 cards.
As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You must discard 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: Test's Pump Handle Slam
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"Devastating Pump Handle Slam by the former roadie..." - Jim Ross

name: Test's Running Boot
effect:
Can only be played if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"JR, what's this all aboot?" - Jerry Lawler

name: The Big, Bad Booty Daddy is Your Hook Up
effect:
Shuffle up to 20 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Your opponent may draw 1 card for every 4 cards shuffled in.
Raw logo
Unique
"He's gonna hook his opponent up - and he sure is gonna holla!" - Jim Ross

name: The Bionic Redneck
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
When this card is in your Ring area, your card titled DTA cannot be reversed and your cards titled Patented Austin Kick to the Gut are -3F and +4D.
Raw logo
Unique

name: The Crippler
effect:
Superstar Ability:
When your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Maneuver card of the same type, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 Maneuver card and put up to 3 Maneuver cards of the same type from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. You may play any cards with the Chris Benoit logo, but you do not count as Chris Benoit.

name: The Devil's in the Detail
effect:
You may put 1 card of 1D from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal and 1 card of 1D from your Ringside pile into your hand.
"There's a reason for everything, King - and this is sure gonna cause mania in that ring!" - Jim Ross

name: The End Is Near
effect:
You may put 1 Maneuver card, 1 Reversal card, and 1 Action card from your Ringside pile into your hand. If your next card played this turn is the card titled From the Top Rope, you can ignore the "Can only be played after..." text.
Smackdown logo
"Ain't much time left, Cole." - Tazz

name: The Haas of Pain
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"If you step in there, you get wrecked." - Tazz

name: The Heart Break Kid
effect:
Your opponent overturns cards equal to his Superstar Value plus the number of Action and Maneuver cards in his Ring area.
Raw logo
Unique
"He was the first to do it, King, the first to fly among the giants!" - Jim Ross

name: The Icon ... The Showstoppa ... The Main Event
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 Unique card, 1 non-Unique Reversal card, and 1 Trademark Finisher, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, your Superstar Value is +1.
Raw logo
Unique

name: The Manbeast
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, you may discard 5 cards to reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Reduce the number of cards discarded by 1 for every 2 Stun Value in your Ring area. The number of cards discarded cannot go below 2.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: The Rattlesnake
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Non-unique cards cannot move cards from any Ringside pile to any other location. You may play any cards with Stone Cold Steve Austin logo, but you do not count as Stone Cold Steve Austin.

name: The Ref Takes Control
effect:
Reverse any Foreign Object card or any maneuver played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring and end your opponent's turn. If the card reversed is a Foreign Object card, remove it from the game.
Smackdown logo
Active

name: There's No Holding Me Back
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, when your opponent successfully plays a maneuver and damage has been applied, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, search your Arsenal for the card titled Series of Suplexes, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and end your opponent's turn. If the first card played on your next turn is the card titled Series of Suplexes, it cannot be reversed.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: This is Gonna Get Ugly
effect:
You must discard 3 cards. Search your Arsenal for 2 different non-unique cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your opponent draws up to 3 cards.
"This is just ... dangerous." - Michael Cole

name: Toothless Aggression
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Blank the maneuver's text and damage and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"I am the best technical wrestler in WWE today!" - The Crippler

name: Top Rope Elbow Drop
effect:
Can only be played after the card titled From the Top Rope.
Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"He's gonna fly! Pilot to tower, we're clear for takeoff!" - Jim Ross

name: Tossed Between the Ropes
effect:
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.
When successfully played, put up to 1 card in your opponent's Ring area that has an Activated Card Effect into his Ringside pile.
Your next card played this turn is considered to be played after the card titled Throw Opponent Out of the Ring.
When successfully played by Rey Mysterio, you may also search your Arsenal for the card titled The 619, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Tu Locas, Ese ... You Crazy, Man
effect:
Reverse any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn. Discard 3 cards.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"Whatchoo tryin' to say, holmes....?" - Eddie Guerrero

name: Version 1.0
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, when you successfully play a Grapple maneuver, shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: We Lie, We Cheat, We Steal
effect:
Search your Arsenal for 3 cards, put them under this card, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns, you may put 1 card from under this card into your hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: West Coast Bronco Buster
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle.
Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: What's Mine is Mine and What's Yours is Mine
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, when your hand is revealed, you may put up to 3 cards in your hand under this card. You may not have more than 6 cards under this card. You may play these cards as if they were in your hand.
When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any card that allows your opponent to search any Arsenal and end his turn.
When this card is put into your Ringside pile from your Ring area, put all cards under this card into your hand.
Active

name: X-treme Hedonism - A Image
effect:
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 3 cards and put this card into your hand.
When this card is in your Ring area, whenever you successfully play a Maneuver card you may draw 1 card or shuffle 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: X-treme Hedonism - B Image
effect:
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 3 cards and put this card into your hand.
When this card is in your Ring area, whenever you successfully play a Maneuver card you may draw 1 card or shuffle 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: X-treme Sendoff
effect:
Your Starting Hand Size is +2.
When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1 and when you successfully play a card with the word "xtreme" or "x-treme" in the title, draw 2 cards or your opponent discards 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Yo Dawg, Respect da Bookerman
effect:
If an effect your opponent controls removes this card from your Ring area, he discards 5 cards.
When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, put 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: You Can't Manhandle the Big Show
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may put 2 cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal, then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent is Undertaker/Deadman Inc, Ric Flair, The Big Freak'n Machine, Brock Lesnar, or The Rattlesnake, the maximum number of Pre-match cards your opponent may have in his Ring area is decreased by 2.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: You Make Me Sick!
effect:
You must discard 2 cards.
When this card is in your Ring area, non-unique Reversal cards played from your hand are -#F, where # is equal to your opponent's Superstar Value.
Active

name: You're a Human Vacuum Cleaner ... You Suck and Blow at the Same Time
effect:
If your opponent's printed Superstar Value is 2 or less, his Superstar Value is +1 and he cannot play Title Belt cards.
When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent is Chris Jericho, Christian, The Crippler, Los Guerreros, or Team Angle, the maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 3.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: You're Going to Space Mountain
effect:
Remove the top 4 cards of your opponent's Arsenal from the game.
Raw logo
Unique
